#summary Hapax3 templater

 [http://code.google.com/p/lxl/source/browse/trunk/coder/src/coder/Main.java Coder Main] uses a [http://code.google.com/p/lxl/source/browse/trunk/hapax3/src/hapax/Template.java Hapax3 Template] from [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/wiki/Language ODL].

 The application target is any bean set that can be described by a template and an [http://code.google.com/p/lxl/source/browse/trunk/coder/src/coder/Class.java ODL class schema].
